DOC.brief_title: CONDOR Temporomandibular Muscle Joint Disorders ( TMJD ) Survey
DOC.detailed_description: The overall goal project collect data use prepare application Clinical Trial Planning Grant design subsequent Phase III clinical trial . The ultimate goal series research project determine practical approach conduct randomize clinical trial ( RCT ) evaluate initial intervention patient painful temporomandibular muscle joint disorder ( TMJD ) use NIDCR 's Collaboration Networked Dental Oral Health Research ( CONDOR ) group consist three dental Practice-Based Research Networks : The Dental Practice-Based Research Network ( DPBNR ) , Northwest Practice-Based Research Collaborative Evidence-based Dentistry ( PRECEDENT ) , Practitioners Engaged Applied Research Learning ( PEARL ) .
DOC.criteria: DPBRN dentist practitionerinvestigator ( general dentist specialist ) complete DPBRN Enrollment Questionnaire 22 year age old
